description: Explore the innovative applications of tokenization in fostering sustainable open-source ecosystems through case studies on Basic Attention Token (BAT), Filecoin, and Gitcoin. These resources provide insights into how tokenization can reward user attention, decentralize digital storage, and fund open-source development.
keywords: Tokenization, Open Source, Sustainability, Basic Attention Token, BAT, Filecoin, Gitcoin, Decentralized Network, Digital Storage, User Attention, Privacy, Funding, Development
title: Insights into Tokenization and Open Source Sustainability
